name: BerryLand Arcade
description:
Remeber Playing BerryLand? Sorta Right?

Well, Get ready for BerryLand Arcade! 

This time, there are no movements buttons. just the buttons for running and throwing cupcakes!

Play Now and you're gaming days will be BERRIFIED!!

Get it? Berrified? Ah well you get the idea

Space key - Jump

B key - Throw Cupcakes

Left and Right Keys-  Movement (Bonus Level Only)

Avoid Carrots and Bottomless pits

XBOX Game Controller (Now Supported!)

A Button - Jump

B Button - Throw Cupcakes

Left and Right Buttons - Movement (Bonus round only)
